channel.title: How do i change my hostname?
channel.description:
Iv been banned off swiftirc unfairly. I want to know how to change my hostname without having to buy a new internet connection.
This may seem like a idiotic question to yuo but im an idiot so try to dum the answer so i can understand it plz

item.title: How do i change my hostname?
item.dc:creator: @Taylor Taylor
item.description:
@Taylor wrote:

[quote=“two1, post:7, topic:5324”]I have a wireless connection with my dads pc. Should i turn his off?[/quote]you dont need to

item.title: How do i change my hostname?
item.dc:creator: @Taylor Taylor
item.description:
@Taylor wrote:

turn off your pc(the one with the modern) turn off modern for 10 mins, then it will change(unless you bhave router, it wont)
